node.name: Feature Working Sets
node.shortdescription:
Generate Working Sets based on Eclipse Features (feature.xml)

This feature will add a button, Generate Working Set based on Features, in the Project menu in your eclipse IDE. The button will remove all existing working sets that does not end with a dot (.) and then read the features you have in your target platform or as open projects and create working sets that match the content of those features ( This will only happen if you have the projects in your package explorer)

This feature will also add a feature dependency viewer, that displays dependencies between features(using the zest framework) clicking on a feature will highlight the content of the feature.
This feature requires: Graphical Editing Framework Zest Visualization Toolkit update site: http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/updates/releases/
node.body:
Generate Working Sets based on Eclipse Features (feature.xml)

This feature will add a button, Generate Working Set based on Features, in the Project menu in your eclipse IDE. The button will remove all existing working sets that does not end with a dot (.) and then read the features you have in your target platform or as open projects and create working sets that match the content of those features ( This will only happen if you have the projects in your package explorer)

This feature will also add a feature dependency viewer, that displays dependencies between features(using the zest framework) clicking on a feature will highlight the content of the feature.
This feature requires: Graphical Editing Framework Zest Visualization Toolkit update site: http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/updates/releases/
